mapper.sql: id, article_id, user_id, evaluate_code, evaluate_name, evaluate_value, create_time
mapper.select: select evaluate_code, evaluate_name, evaluate_value from azbrain_article_evaluate WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND article_id = #{articleId}
mapper.insert:
insert into azbrain_article_evaluate ( article_id, user_id, evaluate_code, evaluate_name, evaluate_value, create_time ) values
( #{eval.articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eval.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eval.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eval.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eval.value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eval.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select:
select u.id as uid, u.name, ae.create_time, GROUP_CONCAT(evaluate_name,':', evaluate_value) as evaluation from azbrain_article_evaluate ae inner join azbrain_user u on ae.user_id = u.id where ae.article_id = #{articleId} and ae.status != '99'
AND u.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
group by user_id

SELECT id, title, GROUP_CONCAT(name, ':', value) as evaluation FROM ( SELECT title, article_id as id, evaluate_name as name, AVG(evaluate_value) as value FROM azbrain_article_evaluate ae INNER JOIN azbrain_article ar ON ar.id = ae.article_id WHERE ae.status != '99' GROUP BY ae.article_id, evaluate_code ) a WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
GROUP BY id
